technology.PITCHED: A roof covered with ceramic or tin tiles. Usually it is sloping
technology.FLAT: A roof covered with bituminous or concrete materials. It is usually horizontal and flat.

hints.projectEditGuaranteeStatus: Project details cannot be edited due to guarantee status.

buildingOwnerDetails.title: Building Owner Details
buildingOwnerDetails.noContent: Building Owner details have not been added to this project
buildingOwnerDetails.name: Name

edit.title: Building owner details
edit.description: You can add the building owner details later on, before applying for a guarantee.

incompleteGuaranteeAlert.title: Information Required
incompleteGuaranteeAlert.description: To complete your application add a certified responsible installer to the project team and upload the evidence required on th Uploads tab.

noProjects.title: No projects to display
noProjects.body1: Change the filter to view different types of project
noProjects.body2: Select a different filter or create a project to get started

noProjectSelected.title: No projects to display
noProjectSelected.body1: You have not select any project yet!
noProjectSelected.body2: Select the "project" from sidebar to get started.

add_team_member_modal.title: Add an installer
add_team_member_modal.caption: Choose the installers who will be working on this project.

teamTab.noContent: No team members have been added to this project

add_evidence_modal.file_validation_message: You cannot upload files larger than

guarantee_tab.nocontent_message: No guarantee has been added yet

message.not_available_tier: This guarantee type is not available in your Tier
message.guarantee_exists_error: You cannot have a Solution or System Guarantee for a project that already has a Product Guarantee

alert_banner.title: Need to know
alert_banner.description: When you send us this guarantee request, the building owner will receive an email, asking them to accept or decline the guarantee. If the building owner accepts, they will receive a second email with the guarantee documentation attached.

responsible_installer.title: A responsible installer
responsible_installer.description: Please select an installer from the Project Team who is acting as the Responsible Installer. They should hold a certificate in the same technology as the Project that you want to guarantee.

required.title: Please complete your application by providing the following:

step2.title: Register for a guarantee
step2.subTitle: Select the preferrred language for the guarantee documentation

step3.product_subTitle: Select the Product for the guarantee documentation
step3.system_subTitle: Select the System for the guarantee documentation
step3.solution_subTitle: Select the System for the guarantee documentation

step4.title: Receipt details
step4.subTitle: Please upload a copy of the receipt for the product(s) you would like to guarantee

step5.title: Review
step5.subTitle: Please review the information that you have provided, before submitting your application.

selectGuarantee.title: There is no guarantee type available for their technology
selectGuarantee.message: Guarantees are not available for this type of roof.  Please contact your local BMI Administrator for more information.

defaultDialog.title: Your guarantee request is being processed and will need to be accepted by the building owner before it is issued.
defaultDialog.description: Once accepted by the building owner, the guarantee certificate will be available to view and download on the Projects page.

solutionDialog.title: Guarantee application started
solutionDialog.description: Complete your application by submitting evidence on the uploads tab.

noteTab.noContent: No notes have been to this project

guaranteeApplyAlert.title: You cannot apply for a guarantee yet

message.buildingOwner: Builder Owner details are not completed

message.certification: The nominated Responsible Installer currently doesn't hold a certification in the same technology as the Project
message.responsibleInstaller: No responsible installer nominated with the required certification
message.tier: You are not in a Tier that supports Guarantees

guaranteeSubmitAlert.title: You cannot submit for a guarantee yet

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: You are about to approve a solution guarantee request. The building owner will receive an email asking them to accept or decline the guarantee. If the building owner accepts, they will receive a second email with the guarantee documentation attached.

reject.title: Are you sure?
reject.description: You are about to reject a solution guarantee request. The installer will be notified. Add a note to this project to confirm to the installer what is required.

guaranteeRestart.note: The guarantee associated with this project has been restarted, so a new guarantee can be requested

confirm.title: Restart Guarantee?
confirm.description: Restarting a guarantee will permanently remove the guarantee from a project, so a new guarantee can be requested. Any team members and uploaded files added to the project will be retained.

copyDialog.title: Copy this project
copyDialog.content: Would you like to copy this project (project details and building owner details) to create a new one?
